actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 19 of title 3, United States Code, to provide for an election of Vice President in the case of vacancies in both the office of President and the office of Vice President.

summary.text: Provides for a special election for the office of President and the office of Vice President in the case of vacancies in both offices. States that if there is one year or more remaining in the present term, then electors shall be appointed or chosen in the several States and they shall elect a President or Vice President for the unexpired portion of the then current Presidential term. Provides for a special election for the office of President and the office of Vice President in the case of vacancies in both offices. States that if there is one year or more remaining in the present term, then electors shall be appointed or chosen in the several States and they shall elect a President or Vice President for the unexpired portion of the then current Presidential term.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 19 of title 3, United States Code, to provide for an election of Vice President in the case of vacancies in both the office of President and the office of Vice President.
